channel.title: Milestone 6 Requirements :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: Web Only This textbook was authored for the CIS 400 - Object-Oriented Design, Implementation, and Testing course at Kansas State University. This section describes assignments specific to the Spring 2023 offering of that course. General requirements: You will need to follow the style laid out in the C# Coding Conventions You will need to comment your code using XML comments You will need to update your UML to reflect your current code

item.title: Previous Versions
